reference.title: Ejecting metadata (REST API)
reference.shortdesc: Bucket ejection from memory is set with POST pools/default/buckets/default.

section.title: Bucket metadata ejection REST API
section.p: To set the maximum of thread workers, use the maxNumberThreads option.
section.note: When editing bucket properties, be sure to specify all bucket properties. If a bucket property is not specified (whether or not you are changing the existing value), Couchbase Server may reset the property to the default. Even if you do not intend to change a certain property, re-specify the existing value to avoid this behavior.
section.p: Bucket REST API method and URI paths include:

row.entry: Retrieves all bucket and bucket operations information from a cluster.
Retrieves information for a single bucket associated with a cluser.
Retrieves bucket statistics for a specific bucket.
